thread.title: $81+ O/W Fall Airfare Sale from American
thread.title_full: $81+ O/W Fall Airfare Sale from American

title: $81+ O/W Fall Airfare Sale from American
text:
$81+ O/W Fall Airfare Sale from American $81+ O/W Fall Airfare Sale from American July 14, 2015 3:59pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
More than 1,500 domestic routes are on sale with American Airlines—but only through midnight on Thursday, July 16. Travel is valid any day except Fridays or Sundays (the most popular travel days on domestic routes) during August 25-December 16. 
The sale restrictions prohibit travel September 3, 4, 7; November 24, 25, 28-30; and require a three-night minimum stay. Pricing starts at $80.50 each way (displayed below as $161 round-trip). EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: The best prices were found for the travel window of these sales by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find these promotions on American 's sale pages. Pros: Availability includes travel most days of the week. Cons:
